user_query: Cooper's clock on the planet Miller passes just one second, the Earth's clock must pass 17 hours and two minutes. Nolan also hoped that the perimeter of the event horizon would not be too large. No one would want to see the black screen only. Given this, Kip Thorne created Gargantua, which is 100 million times the mass of the Sun and is 1 billion kilometers around the horizon. He also concluded that only when the rotational speed of the Gargantua is close to its maximum value, a time delay occurs that Nolan wants. Why is there a maximum value for the rotation speed of a black hole? If Endurance is stuck at the edge of Gargantua's event horizon, the faster the Gargantua spins, the faster the Endurance will speed up. If the gargantuan spins fast enough, the speed of the Endurance may be faster than light. But this can't happen. This is because, said before, the laws of physics prohibit moving faster than light. So, if you divide the 1 billion kilometers at the speed of light, you conclude that Gargantua's orbital period is one hour. Gargantua also has a brightly shining ring. The ring was created by Gargantua pulling stars to pieces with powerful gravity and then incorporating it into his orbit. This is called accretion disk. But the disk looks very different from the disk of Gargantua. The images of black holes that we often see have one disk, and Gargantua appears to have two disks, up and down and back and forth. entities.entity_description: Cooper는 밀러 행성에서 시간 지연을 경험하는 인물로, 그의 시계가 1초 지나갈 때 지구에서는 17시간 2분이 흐른다
Nolan은 영화 감독으로, 사건의 지평선 둘레가 너무 크지 않기를 원했으며 특정 시간 지연 효과를 원했다
Kip Thorne은 과학 자문으로, 태양 질량의 1억 배이고 지평선 둘레가 10억 킬로미터인 가르강튀아 블랙홀을 설계했다
Gargantua는 영화 속 블랙홀로, 태양 질량의 1억 배이며 지평선 둘레가 10억 킬로미터이고, 강력한 중력으로 별들을 끌어당겨 강착원반을 형성한다
Miller는 밀러 행성의 이름과 관련된 인물로, 이 행성에서 극심한 시간 지연이 발생한다
Endurance는 가르강튀아의 사건의 지평선 가장자리에서 블랙홀의 회전에 따라 속도가 증가하는 우주선이다
Interstellar는 블랙홀 가르강튀아와 시간 지연, 우주 탐험을 다루는 SF 영화이다
